name: Avoid Them!
description:
Avoid Them it's 3D game where the main point it's survive as much seconds as you can avoiding the incoming balls that are trying to push you!

Hope you enjoy it!

This game has been made on a personal one game a week challenge and it has been my first 3D game.
For more information check my twitter: https://twitter.com/Paco_S

Main menu music: http://freesound.org/people/B_Lamerichs/sounds/266615/
Battle music: http://freesound.org/people/B_Lamerichs/sounds/262767/
